channel.title: OSRemake | | New pictures | | Beta is almost here
channel.description:
[center][b][i]Support OSRemake! ;)[/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2q1eb0h.png[/img] [b][size=13pt]RS2 Old Skool Remake: Bringing back the good memories, piece by piece![/size][/b]
Here's a [i]little[/i] sample of the OSRemake pking. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zm3N6FZKKpI
[b][i]About Us:[/i][/b] Welcome to our project thread, and first of all, we would like to thank-you for viewing our project. We hope that we can get as many supporters as can be, because maybe in a few months when we release this, "we might become legends", as Dane said in one of his posts.
RS2 Old Skool Remake is based off of the server base shards by Graham simply because of the stability.
We will not have any of these 'custom items', 'custom gameframes', and we will certainly not be one of those sh*tty DeltaScape server leaches that you see now-a-days. What happened to the good ol' days, huh? What happened to the 'old servers' that we used to play, the ones that had real skills, real PKing, no customs? Isn't that what we love(d)? That is why we are hoping to create a server who prefer the 'old skool' runescape over the new runescape, and by doing that, we shall re-create the old RuneScape to the maximum and fullest we can go towards it.
The cost of membership will be at no cost simply because we want those who don't/can't pay for membership want the greatest experience they've had in their RuneScape history.
[ul][li]There will absolutely no custom items involved or even mentioned in the project. There will be no custom NPC's involved, none that are in the wrong place, each NPC where it should be. Drop-trading will be enabled for goodness sake![/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[i][b]Meet the Development Team/Creators[/b][/i] [i]Note: This section will get updated shall we get a new person to be on our development team.[/i]
[i][b] Developers[/b][/i] [i]Thing1 - Owner of the project.
G0nzo - Server Coder of the project.
Dane - Server Coder of the project.
Muroth - Server Coder of the project.[/i]
[i][b]Configuration Coders[/b][/i] [i](drops, spawns, ect.)[/i]
Truu Blue - Configuration Coder of the project.
Scape-JAVA - Configuration Coder of the project.
xGarret21 - Configuration Coder of the project.
[i][b]Newest Update(s):[/b][/i] [code] 5/11/2009: Mining Guild Spawn 5/11/2009: Gnome Glider 5/11/2009: Objects/Ladders so on 5/11/2009: Fixed Skills 5/11/2009: Sounds 5/11/2009: Added a decient amount of fight cave waves, finishing it later. 5/11/2009: Added Dwarven Mine npc spawn 5/11/2009: Added Barrows Tunnels Npc spawn 5/11/2009: Added Bandits Camp Spawn and zanaris spawn 5/11/2009: Added Legends Guild Dungeon Spawn 5/11/2009: Added Mountain and Black knights place spawn 5/11/2009: Added Falador wizzard spawn 5/11/2009: Fixed some bugs in Npc spawn 5/11/2009: Finished Rimmington
6/11/2009: Added protect item in prayer lol 6/11/2009: Added Crafting Uncut and Cut ints for future system. 6/11/2009: Fixed X log 6/11/2009: Fixed all known dupes. 6/11/2009: Started a handler on cats.
7/11/2009: Added all Sarim Doors to Shops 7/11/2009: Added The guy who hands out flyers at the desert! (doing his shouts now)
8/11/2009: 80% Cannon!!! 8/11/2009: Did some npc projectiles, emotes so on 8/11/2009: Multi hit base, can be used for multi barrage 8/11/2009: Brimhaven Agi course objects 60% 8/11/2009: Added 100% clipped following OUR way, no cheap hax.
9/11/09: Started on Goblin diplomacy 9/11/09: Added 100% Dorics Quest 9/11/09: Added 100% Witch's Potion 9/11/09: Almost finished sheep shearer, just gotta do the configs
10/11/09: Redoing Rune Mysteries completely 10/11/09: Found ALOT of interfaces, 10/11/09: Fixed the NPC combat bug 10/11/09: Fixed game option tab (its now high detail) 10/11/09: Brimhaven Agi interface works 100%, 10/11/09: level up interfaces 10/11/09: Sheep Shearer is basically done, just add item delete (gotta go to skool now) will do later. (also gotta add the sheep shearing part) 10/11/09: Added saving for all 18 free quests - Dane 10/11/09: Corrected Quest Journal colours to the real colors of RS-2006 - Dane 10/11/09: Finished imps Catcher 10/11/09: Finished Goblin Diplomacy (UNTESTED) 10/11/09: Got all dialogues for pirate's treasure
11/11/09: Cook's Assistant 11/11/09: Part of Potion Handler 11/11/09: FIXED cooks assistant and really finished it, was missing something. 11/11/09: Finished Imps Catcher
12/11/09: All barrows hills work 12/11/09: Tutorial island has been started! - Dane (For Ryan) 12/11/09: fixed alot of karajma as in added shops, missing npcs, and banana picking. 12/11/09: Started on loading the Pirates Treasure Dialogues 12/11/09: Finished 100% wilderness spawn
13/11/09: Improved Prayer Alot. Npcs now hit more correctly when you pray aginst their type.
14/11/09: High and Low Alching 14/11/09: Anti DRAGON FIRE SHIELD 14/11/09: Flashing arrow over objects and player/npc's, just needs to be fixed client sided 14/11/09: Doors and bank at castlewars 14/11/09: started on castlewars 14/11/09: Magic on ground item packet (case 181) 14/11/09: Telegrab complete
15/11/09: Fixed alot of client updates (fixed deob from crashing on stuff) 15/11/09: Loaded all headicons correctly a new way 15/11/09: Loaded 377 whip emote 15/11/09: Added hint icon (used for barrows, or for dueling) 15/11/09: Finished Multi Sound Methods my way for our client (renamed).
16/11/09: Completely finished two handed weapons. - Dane 16/11/09: Added alot of weapons to 2h! - Dane 16/11/09: fixed multi in wildy 16/11/09: 164 100% EXACT old rs shops 16/11/09: Added 377 login interface
17/11/09: Some slayer monster requirements just need tasks.
18/11/09: Did a huge part of tutorial island. 18/11/09: Created Auto casting for alot of staffs.
19/11/09 - 22/11/09: Fixing all bugs possible found, adding doors, and lots of little features that make a difference (Also preparing for release)
23/11/09: - Castle wars about 60% 23/11/09: - Improved magics quite a bit.
24/11/09: - loaded this [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2s01zdt.jpg[/IMG] 24/11/09: - loaded goblin drops 100% = sexy loaded cow drops 100% = sexy loaded chicken drops 100% loaded unicorn drops 100% lol loaded bear drops 100% loaded guard drops 100% loaded men drops 100% loaded women drops 100% loaded rats drops 100% loaded giant rats drops 100% loaded imp drops 100% loaded giant spider drops 100%
---LOADED ALL LUMBRIDGE NPC DROPS---
loaded wizzard drops 100%
---LOADED ALL WIZARD GUILD NPC DROPS---
25/11/09: -Loaded Every Thieving Npc in old runescape loading correct loot, xp, and requirements.
26/11/09: -Loaded Every spawned npc on server to correct emotes and drops (that i know of...).
27/11/09: -Finished New skulling system (Big thanks to localhost for doing the headicons) New skulling system includes -Melee -Range -Magic -Skull + Prayer icon -Protect 1 extra item prayer.
----------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------- ALSO thanks 0h d 3 a r for the quest dialogues for -Romeo and Juliet -Knights Sword -Pirates Treasure ------------------------------------------------------
• Restless Ghost finished except the quest diary part, so 85% • everything in above pictures lol, added lots of dungeons • Added 100% deposit box • All F2P Monster Drops/Spawns are done. • GOT ALL F2P Dialogues EXACTLY as old runescapes! • GOT REAL 317 LOGIN SCREEN • Converted all of the quests, towns, and shops to Shards. • Fixed Shops Bugs.[/code]
[i]Green = Completed[/i] [i]Orange = In Development[/i] [i]Red = Not Started[/i]
[i] Lumbridge Draynor Port Sarim Barbarian Village Varrock Falador Al Kharid Draynor Port Sarim Rimmington[/i]
[i][b]Quest(s) Progression[/b][/i] [i]F2P Quest Status:[/i]
Black Knight's Fortress - Not Started Cooks Assistant - 100% Completed [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hf8llx.jpg[/img]
Demon Slayer - Not Started Doric's Quest - 100% Completed [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2d7g3gk.png[/img]
Dragon Slayer - Not Started Ernest the Chicken - Not Started Goblin Diplomacy - 90% Completed Imp Catcher - 100% Completed The Knights Sword - Not Started Pirate's Treasure - 90% [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/qoazog.jpg[/img]
Prince Ali Rescue - 20% Done The Restless Ghost - 95% Completed Romeo & Juliet - Not Started Rune Mysteries - Not Started Sheep Shearer - 100% Completed [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2dcbfqh.jpg[/img]
Shield of Arrav - Not Started Vampire Slayer - Not Started Witch's Potion - 100% Completed [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/289d8g0.jpg[/img]
[b][i]Mini-Games Progress[/i][/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/xllzs9.jpg[/img]
[i][b]Media[/b][/i] [i]Combat[/i] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/35klks4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/tzlgw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/27xidq9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2s01zdt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2197v2f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2lu2esj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34y4ols.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/307lrlt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sbkoit.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/o8w4s3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/9gyskg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20750er.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yoxtzb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2mhzplv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nqwaoi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/72zrle.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2mwdul3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/9ixuu9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/334ol00.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/16c54bk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vb4g8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2itdzm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/w7296p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2hi9kkw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/wvs3s0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/64hvfa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mdexbr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/9llbh1.jpg[/img]

item.title: OSRemake | | New pictures | | Beta is almost here
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Yeah, you said “get your own client”. I’ve tried with a deltascape one, the character was glitched, i had all prayers on top of my head and when i try to use prayer for example Protect from melee it shows up Protect from range, etc… Tried with bluurr’s client, freezed on login, tried with a clean 317 client with 377 cache, didn’t let me even login. I wish i could configure it myself to work with another client but when it comes to configuring server with client i suck.

If you could post a client download link that would be good, i want to try out the gameplay.

Read full topic
